article: My home is nice. I have a pet  in my home  and  _  name is Polly. It is a parrot . I like Polly a lot. My classmate, Hu Tao,  _  a pet, too. The name of it is Bobby. It is a dog. Hu Tao  likes  Bobby very much. Do you have  a pet  in your home? I often go to English Corner . I like  _  a lot. I speak English  _  some friends at the English Corner.  _  Hu Tao doesn't like the English Corner. He doesn't like English  at all  . His English is  _  .So I often help him study English.
